original_text: Wherefore hast thou despised the commandment of the Lord, to do evil in his sight? thou hast killed Uriah the Hittite with the sword, and hast taken his wife to be thy wife, and hast slain him with the sword of the children of Ammon.
korean_text: 그러한데 어찌하여 네가 여호와의 말씀을 업신여기고 나 보기에 악을 행하였느냐 네가 칼로 헷 사람 우리아를 치되 암몬 자손의 칼로 죽이고 그의 아내를 빼앗아 네 아내로 삼았도다

sentences.original_text: Wherefore hast thou despised the commandment of the Lord
to do evil in his sight?
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 보시기 앞에 악을 행하려고 하였느냐

sentences.original_text: thou hast killed Uriah the Hittite with the sword
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 칼로 헷 사람 우리아를 죽였고

sentences.original_text: and hast taken his wife to be thy wife
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아내를 빼앗아 네 아내로 삼았고

sentences.original_text: and hast slain him with the sword of the children of Ammon.
